column6: "ENEMY OF THE STATE" PART 4 (OF 6) Brainwashed by the Hand, an evil Wolverine is wreaking havoc all over the country. Elektra's tracking his trail of destruction...and tracking her are a couple dozen Hand ninjas... Sitting back and watching with glee is Baron Wolfgang Von Strucker...whose work and personal lives are about to get a little too close for comfort, thanks to The Gorgon.
column8: | inker:Klaus Janson | writer:Mark Millar | colorist:Paul Mounts | penciller (cover):John Romita JR. | letterer:Rus Wooton
